description.plain:
Leigh-Anne Pinnock (born October 4, 1991) is a pop singer, who is a member of the hit British girl band Little Mix alongside Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall and previously Jesy Nelson. They were formed during the 8th season of the television music competition ‘The X Factor’, and were the first band to win the show.

In 2021, after eleven years of being together, the trio made the collective decision of going into a hiatus to pursue individual endevours. During that year, Leigh-Anne made her acting debut in the film Boxing Day, while also contributing to its soundtrack, performing three songs. Among them, an original track titled “Woman” and a cover of Aretha Franklin’s classic “Say a Little Prayer.”

In 2023, Leigh-Anne released her first two solo singles, “Don’t Say Love” and “My Love” featuring Ayra Starr. Her solo album is expected to be released in 2024.

body.plain:
Leigh-Anne Pinnock (born October 4, 1991) is a pop singer, who is a member of the hit British girl band Little Mix alongside Perrie Edwards, Jade Thirlwall and previously Jesy Nelson. They were formed during the 8th season of the television music competition ‘The X Factor’, and were the first band to win the show.

In 2021, after eleven years of being together, the trio made the collective decision of going into a hiatus to pursue individual endevours. During that year, Leigh-Anne made her acting debut in the film Boxing Day, while also contributing to its soundtrack, performing three songs. Among them, an original track titled “Woman” and a cover of Aretha Franklin’s classic “Say a Little Prayer.”

In 2023, Leigh-Anne released her first two solo singles, “Don’t Say Love” and “My Love” featuring Ayra Starr. Her solo album is expected to be released in 2024.

songs.full_title: Don't Say Love by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Don’t Say Love

description.plain:
“Don’t Say Love” marks the debut solo single of Leigh-Anne Pinnock from the English girl group, Little Mix. This solo release stands out as the first musical drop from any of the three active members of the band, who entered a hiatus in May 2022 to work on their individual endeavors.

The UK Garage and Dance-Pop influenced track finds Leigh-Anne asking for sincerity regarding the emotions of a significant other as she doesn’t want to waste her time and instead wants to find something genuine. However, as she explained in her Rolling Stone interview, it’s also about “feeling invisible and unheard for so much of my career,” a topic she previously touched on while promoting her 2021 BBC documentary Race, Pop & Power, which explores racism across the music industry and confronts her own experiences as the only black member of Little Mix.

On June 6th, 2023, a post with the caption “#leighanneiscoming” was published on Leigh-Anne’s Instagram with a preview of a visualizer and the first few seconds of the song. A pre-save link for “DSL” was available on her social media bios. Two days after, the singer shared the cover art and title as well as announcing the release date.

I’ve waited an incredibly long time to say this and I can’t believe it’s actually happening. DON’T SAY LOVE. My debut solo single is coming on JUNE 16 and you can pre-save/pre-add it RIGHT NOW! x

songs.embed_content: Read “Don't Say Love” by Leigh-Anne on Genius

body.plain:
“Don’t Say Love” marks the debut solo single of Leigh-Anne Pinnock from the English girl group, Little Mix. This solo release stands out as the first musical drop from any of the three active members of the band, who entered a hiatus in May 2022 to work on their individual endeavors.

The UK Garage and Dance-Pop influenced track finds Leigh-Anne asking for sincerity regarding the emotions of a significant other as she doesn’t want to waste her time and instead wants to find something genuine. However, as she explained in her Rolling Stone interview, it’s also about “feeling invisible and unheard for so much of my career,” a topic she previously touched on while promoting her 2021 BBC documentary Race, Pop & Power, which explores racism across the music industry and confronts her own experiences as the only black member of Little Mix.

On June 6th, 2023, a post with the caption “#leighanneiscoming” was published on Leigh-Anne’s Instagram with a preview of a visualizer and the first few seconds of the song. A pre-save link for “DSL” was available on her social media bios. Two days after, the singer shared the cover art and title as well as announcing the release date.

I’ve waited an incredibly long time to say this and I can’t believe it’s actually happening. DON’T SAY LOVE. My debut solo single is coming on JUNE 16 and you can pre-save/pre-add it RIGHT NOW! x

If you're down, I'm down for life, just

Empty lies, empty words, entertainment

I need, I need, I need, I just need somethin' that's real
Don't say "love" if that's not what you're chasin'
Truth might hurt, but I know I can take it
Don't say "love" if that's not what you're chasin'
I need, I need, I need, I just need somethin' that
I just need somethin' that, I just need somethin' that's real

[Verse 2]
Just take it personal
If I, if I do say so, it's personal
I ain't gon' protect your feelings anymore
I cannot pretend like this is perfect, this is perfect

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell me something's wrong (Somethin' wrong)
I feel like I just can't be myself (Myself)
Can you be strong? (Be strong)
I don't wanna be with someone else
Is somethin' wrong? (Somethin' wrong)
If we're gonna be, I need your help
If you're down, I'm down for life, just

[Chorus]
Don't say "love" if that's not what you're chasin'
Empty lies, empty words, entertainment
Don't say "love" just because you can say it
I need, I need, I need, I just need somethin' that's real

[Post-Chorus]
Give me somethin' I can hold on to, boy
Give me somethin' I can hold forever, for life
If it's not you, gotta watch me leave, boy
I need, I need, I need, I just need somethin' that

(Real)
I just need somethin' that's real (Oh)

I need, I need, I need, I just need somethin' that
I just need somethin' that, I just need somethin' that's real

songs.full_title: My Love by Leigh-Anne (Ft. Ayra Starr)
songs.title: My Love

description.plain:
“My Love” is the second solo single from Leigh-Anne. The Afrobeat and Amapiano inspired song features Nigerian singer Ayra Starr.

Leigh-Anne teased the song for the first time in an interview with British Vogue while promoting her debut single, “Don’t Say Love”. A second teaser was unveiled on August 21, 2023, through Leigh-Anne’s Instagram. The cover art and Ayra as the featured artist were announced just two days after.

songs.full_title: Stealin' Love by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Stealin’ Love

description.plain:
The song depicts the emotional turmoil of being in a relationship where love feels unreciprocated. The song captures the complexity of love, trust, and the pain of unfulfilled promises.

Fan theories: Because of the pre-chorus’s lyrics “Stealin' Love” sounding like “Still in Love”. Some fans believe it’s a double entendre. Which flips the song from being about an unappreciated lover. To being about a lover not ready for love and trying to sabotage it while running towards it.

Who would do that twice?
Tell you that I'm hurtin', then you go and twist the knife
You're stealin' love (Stealin' love)

[Outro]
You're stealin' love
You're stealin' love

songs.full_title: Forbidden Fruit by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Forbidden Fruit

description.plain:
This is about the dubious nature of meeting the love of your life, when you’re with someone else. The song suggests true love is always worth it even when it comes with a price.

This song shows how the toxic lover that’s sung about all over the No Hard Feelings EP. Isn’t the only toxic one that has self-destructing behavior or makes bad decisions.

Forbidden Fruit plays with the Adam and Eve story but flips it on its head. Instead of Adam, the man, being the innocent person tricked by the wickedly seductive, female, Eve. Leigh Anne plays the male role of Adam, but not so innocent. She actively choses her seducer. And her love interest plays the female role, Eve. They both know the deal and are engaging in an affair.

songs.full_title: OMG by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: OMG

description.plain:
OMG is a playful song, that highlights female agency in their sexuality. It also encourages the type of connections that can be had with a partner in a healthy partnership. Themes of consent and power are evident throughout the track.

PS: This track simulates the progression of intimate activity with a partner. The 1st verse can be seen as foreplay highlighting emotional connection. The 1st chorus, “Know what you need, right before you speak…” signals more physical intimacy. Then by the time the 2nd verse hits, “Slip inside, take a bite / Keep your heart inside, make it hard all night” it’s all about primal desire. Things climax in the final chorus and wine down during the post chorus.

songs.embed_content: Read “OMG” by Leigh-Anne on Genius

songs.full_title: I'll Still Be Here by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: I’ll Still Be Here

description.plain:
This song is a heartfelt track that emphasizes unwavering support and commitment in a relationship.

This song also has two other meanings:

Meaning 1: This is Leigh Anne’s sentiments towards the racist pop music industry. Who left her feeling ignored and underappreciated while in Little Mix. No matter what she’s resolved to pursuing her music career and has amended the hurt the industry has caused her.

Meaning 2: This could also be Leigh Anne’s love letter towards the fans, who’ve been there through all her struggles. She is still committed to them and pursuing her pop career.

songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'll still be— I'm not leaving

[Chorus]

I'll still be here, I'm not leaving
Here to catch you when you falling
I'll still be— I'm not leaving
Even if we're ever in doubt
Take the time, go figure it out
Wake up in the early morning
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Post-Chorus]
I'll still be here, I'm still breathing
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Verse 1]
Why you letting girls sit at the table?
Make me feel a little unstable
Shouldn't have to feel like that
I could do it right back, but I won't
Just to please your ego
That's not the person that I know
Show up just to show out
When you go out, time to get home

[Pre-Chorus]
Find it difficult believing you
But I believe that what we have is true
That's the reason why I say I do
(I'll still be here, I'm not leaving)

[Chorus]
Even when the rain is pouring
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving
Here to catch you when you falling
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving
Even if we're ever in doubt
Take the time, go figure it out
Wake up in the early morning
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Post-Chorus]
I'll still be here, I'm still breathing (I'll still be there)
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Verse 2]
The first to admit I have bad days
Insecure in the worst way
I don't wanna feel like that
It's not my bad, but you say

[Pre-Chorus]
Come on, you know that was years ago
Took you for granted, but I swear I won't
We taking time, but I hope you know
(I'll still be here, I'm not leaving)

[Chorus]

Here to catch you when you falling

Even if we're ever in doubt
Take the time, go figure it out

I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Post-Chorus]
I'll still be here, I'm still breathing (I'll still be there)
I'll still be here, I'm not leaving

[Post-Chorus]

I'll still be here, I'm not leaving (I'll still be here, I'm not leaving)
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, baby, I'll still be here
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, baby, I'll still be here
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, baby, I'll still be here

songs.full_title: I Need You by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: I Need You
songs.embed_content: Read “I Need You” by Leigh-Anne on Genius
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, ooh
You need me as much as I need you
Ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh
You need me as much as I need you

[Verse 1]

Under all of this pressure
Tryin' not to lose my patience
But I'm at the end of my tither
I can't even focus, I can't even chill
Stressin' myself over shit that isn't real
Heavy on my phone obsession
But you give me attention

[Pre-Chorus]
I still give my love when I feel defeated
I still keep my cool when I'm on my ceilin'
I just saw you smile and it gave me meanin'
You need me just as much as I need you, you

[Chorus]
I'm needin' you, just like you'rе needin' me

You need me as much as I need you

I'm needin' you, just like you're needin' me
I'm needin' you, ah
You need me just as much as I need you

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh
You need me just as much as I need you

[Verse 2]

Most time I be feelin' like less then
These times you know I ain't even restin'
These times I ain't even had breakfast
All up in my business, wanna know the tea
I wanna see the faces, you won't let it be
Sorry, but I gotta protect them
World's so reckless

[Pre-Chorus]
I still give my love when I feel defeated
I still keep my cool when I'm on the ceilin'
I just saw you smile and it gave me meanin'
You need me just as much as I need you, you

[Chorus]
I'm needin' you, just like you're needin' me
I'm needin' you, just like you're needin' me
I'm needin' you, ah
You need me as much as I need you
I'm needin' you, just like you're needin' me
I'm needin' you, just like you're needin' me
I'm needin' you, ah
You need me just as much as I need you

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh
You need me just as much as I need you
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh
You need me just as much as I need you

[Outro]
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh (Ooh)
Ooh, ooh
You need me just as much as I need you

songs.full_title: Anticipate by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Anticipate
songs.embed_content: Read “Anticipate” by Leigh-Anne on Genius
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh

[Verse 1]
Your car is in the driveway
I been runnin' through my feelin' all day
'Cause you know I miss you in the worst way
'Specially with all the memories we just made
Might even make another baby
You won't even let you, but I can't wait
To do all the things that I crave when I'm

[Pre-Chorus]
All alone with you on the phone
When you talkin' like that, better watch your tone
Tryna make it last, you can take it back
'Cause I'ma hold you to that, but I know you do that

[Chorus]
Yeah, I love the way you make me anticipate
How bad you wanna show me it's worth the wait?
You do you while I handle mine
The way you get home with me on my time
Ooh, the only thing better than missin' you

[Post-Chorus]
Is kissin' you, lovin' you, touchin' you
I wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you
You wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you
That's the only thing better than missin' you

[Verse 2]
Can't sleep
All I really want is your body beside me
Feels a little lonely up in these sheets (Ooh)
'Specially without your energy in my dreams
I'm ready for you to come and take me
Goin' out my mind, you know I can't wait
To do all the things that I crave when I'm

[Pre-Chorus]
All alone with you on the phone
When you talkin' like that, better watch your tone
Tryna make it last, you can take it back
'Cause I'ma hold you to that, but I know you do that

[Chorus]
Yeah, I love the way you make me anticipate
How bad you wanna show me it's worth the wait?
You do you while I handle mine
The way you get home with me on my time
Ooh, the only thing better than missin' you

[Post-Chorus]
Is kissin' you, lovin' you, touchin' you
I wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you (Oh)
You wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you
That's the only thing better than missin' you
Kissin' you, lovin' you, touchin' you (When I'm touchin' you)
I wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you (You)
You wanna kiss on you, love on you, touch on you
That's the only thing better than missin' you

[Outro]
Oh

songs.full_title: Woman by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Woman

description.plain:
“Woman” is one of the three songs Leigh-Anne, from the British girl group Little Mix, recorded for the 2021 film Boxing Day, movie in which she stars as a famous singer and the protagonist’s ex-girlfriend.

The track was co-written with her long time collaborator MNEK, and it’s also the only original song she wrote for the film.

songs.embed_content: Read “Woman” by Leigh-Anne on Genius

album.full_title: Boxing Day (The Soundtrack) by Various Artists
album.name: Boxing Day (The Soundtrack)

body.plain:
“Woman” is one of the three songs Leigh-Anne, from the British girl group Little Mix, recorded for the 2021 film Boxing Day, movie in which she stars as a famous singer and the protagonist’s ex-girlfriend.

The track was co-written with her long time collaborator MNEK, and it’s also the only original song she wrote for the film.

songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I wanna be, I wanna be
I wanna be, I wanna be

[Verse 1]
Feels like I've been though every phrase wrong
Heartbreak, honeymoon and teenage
Thought growing up would make a change, but it don't, oh
The thing about lovin' you is so hard
Is that you're always so close yet so far
I just can't keep playing this part anymore, ah

[Pre-Chorus]
Who knew movin' on was so easy for you
Still wonderin' what did I do
But I know that one thing is true

[Chorus]
That when I was your woman
I never kept my hands to myself
I gave you love like you never felt
But baby, you let me go, let me go
No, I'm not your woman (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
I can't see you kissing somеbody else (I wanna be, I wanna bе, woman)
I know it's gonna hurt me like hell
But baby, I'll let it go, let it go

[Post-Chorus]
I'll be my own woman
If I don't wanna be no one else's woman
I don't wanna be no one else's
Maybe I should be more selfish
Maybe I should remember it starts and ends with me

[Verse 2]
Must be a part of the plan (Plan)
Some things I'll never understand (Understand)
But if it helps me find out who I am, that's okay
That's okay, you know it hurts

[Pre-Chorus]
When you're on the wrong side of the world
Well, I guess you live and learn
But I still feel those three little words

[Chorus]
'Cause when I was your woman (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
I never kept my hands to yourself (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
I gave you love like you never felt
But baby, you let me go, let me go
'Cause I'm not your woman (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
I can't see you kissing somebody else (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
I know it's gonna hurt me like hell
But baby, I'll let it go, let it go

[Post-Chorus]
I'll be my own woman (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
Be my own woman (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
Be mine (I wanna be, I wanna be, woman)
Baby, I'll let it go, let it go

[Outro]
Be my own woman
So I don't get left with a broken heart
That way my world won't be torn apart
I just can't let you go, let you go

songs.full_title: Nature by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Nature

description.plain: The surprised-dropped “Nature” is the sixth and last track on Leigh-Anne’s reissue of her debut solo EP, No Hard Feelings. It was released two weeks after the EP and had its live debut just a day before its official release at her first headline show. The reggae-island-inspired love song was also written solely by Leigh-Anne.

songs.embed_content: Read “Nature” by Leigh-Anne on Genius

body.plain: The surprised-dropped “Nature” is the sixth and last track on Leigh-Anne’s reissue of her debut solo EP, No Hard Feelings. It was released two weeks after the EP and had its live debut just a day before its official release at her first headline show. The reggae-island-inspired love song was also written solely by Leigh-Anne.

songs.full_title: Nature (City Sessions – Amazon Music Live) by Leigh-Anne
songs.title: Nature (City Sessions – Amazon Music Live)

songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ah-yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ah-yeah
Ah-yeah, yeah, yeah, ah

[Verse 1]
Ooh, baby, I want all of it
Turn me on with your confidence
Cocoa butter skin sparklin'
You the one, no argument
Give you the keys to my apartment
Hung on you like an ornament
Good love, got me hollerin'
Stood tall, now I'm fallin' (You got me fallin')

[Pre-Chorus]
My mama said that lovin' could be blindin'
But I know my baby only movin' on my timin'
Boy, I'm really lovin' all the pressure you're applyin'
You know when you come around I gon' be smilin'

[Chorus]
Ah-yeah, it's in your riddim
Sweet talk, make me wanna sit down
Your love's one in a million
Don't care about nobody else opinion, no

[Post-Chorus]
Call and I come wherever you are
Love how you move, it's in your nature
When it's for you, I'm never too far
Love how you move, it's in your nature

[Interlude]
In your nature, it's in your nature
In your nature, 'ture

[Verse 2]
Yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah
Got me trippin', I'm stumblin', no fault of mine
When you're all on me makin' it hard to decline
Give it all to my baby, he always on time (You know)
Wanna be a gallivanter pon your body tonight
Mm, mm, sun kissin', we look good in the light
Wanna be a gallivanter pon your body tonight
Mm, mm, sun kissin', we look good in the light, oh, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
My mama said that lovin' could be blindin'
But I know my baby only movin' on my timin'
Boy, I'm really lovin' all the pressure you're applyin'
You know when you come around I gon' be smilin'

[Chorus]
Ah-yeah, it's in your riddim (Oh, yeah)
Sweet talk, make me wanna sit down
Your love's one in a million
Don't care about nobody else opinion, no (Oh, no)

[Post-Chorus]
Call and I come wherever you are (Are)
Love how you move, it's in your nature ('Ture)
When it's for you, I'm never too far
Love how you move, it's in your nature
Call and I come wherever you are
Love how you move, it's in your nature
When it's for you, I'm never too far
Love how you move, it's in your nature

[Outro]
In your nature, it's in your nature (Ayy)
In your nature, 'ture
In your nature, it's in your nature
In your nature, 'ture
